sentences.sentence: He was brought up in penury, without education.
sentences.translation: 他从小一贫如洗，没有受过教育。

sentences.sentence: This is my prayer to thee, my Lord — strike, strike at the root of penury in my heart.
sentences.translation: 这是我对你的祈求，我的主——请你铲除，铲除我心里贫乏的根源。

sentences.sentence: In other words, wealthy people, in an effort to alleviate penury, would create a savings bank.
sentences.translation: 换句话说，富人们要扶危济困，便建立了储蓄银行。
